session.@description: Id of the session all packets belong to

packetId.@description: Id of the packet for proper ordering

car.@description: Internal code that identifies the car

position.@description: Position on the track. Track units are in meters

velocity.@description: Velocity in track units (which are meters) for each axis

relativeOrientationToNorth.@description: Orientation to North. 1.0 is north, 0.0 is south

angularVelocity.@description: How fast the car turns around axes. (In radians/second, -1 to 1)

gasLevel.@description: Gas level for the current car (in liters, from 0 to GasCapacity

gasCapacity.@description: Max gas capacity for the current car

metersPerSecond.@description: Current speed in meters per second. <see cref="MetersPerSecond * 3.6"/> to get it in KPH

distance.@description: Current distance on track in meter (metersPerSecond / lapTick)

turboBoost.@description: Value below 1.0 is below 0 ingame, so 2.0 = 1 x 100kPa

timeOfDayProgression.@description: Current time of day on the track

preRaceStartPositionOrQualiPos.@description: Position of the car before the race has started

numCarsAtPreRace.@description: Number of cars in the race before the race has started

minAlertRPM.@description: Minimum RPM to which the rev limiter shows an alert

maxAlertRPM.@description: Maximum RPM to the rev limiter alert

calculatedMaxSpeed.@description: Possible max speed achievable using the current transmission settings

rpmFromClutchToGearbox.@description: Basically same as engine rpm when in gear and the clutch pedal is not depressed

transmissionTopSpeed.@description: Top Speed (as a Gear Ratio value)
